threads.text: Fantastic, ZTE put all other major manufacturers at shame with this unique device. Too bad they don't advertise enough and the specs are not clearly provided but is working great on Tmobile so I am thinking that the bands availability is well thought out. Kudos to ZTE.
Yes
Quite fast, although a more recent processor would be nice!
Not sure how they do it, but even cold starting apps is really fast.
Fu
I don't notice any apps running out of memory or having to reload while multitasking on my 6GB Ram model
Gubo
There is usually no stuttering while scrolling
Gg
You will be able to capture some levels of detail, but the photos are doomed with bad overall lighting and noise

Terrible camera. Don't buy this phone if you are selfie king or a queen. There is only one camera to cover both selfie and regular mode which is very confusing to use and you will most likely drop the phone during the switching the screen back and forth or your wife will divorce you since these are the days of instant gratification

We are very sorry to hear your impression of our Axon M. We would love the opportunity change your opinion. Please contact us at 1-877-817-1759 for assistance with the camera.

ZTEUSA Support

The phones aren't bad, neither really good.

If you give it enough light the photos will be alright. Too bad the device lacks OIS
Gru
Video is not bad, the device supports 1080p and 4K recording. The video gets kinda shaky due the lack of OIS though

title: Time to take picture (camera launch speed)

threads.text: The camera launches quite fast
Dyu
Charges very quickly, I think it charges to 100% in under 2 hours. I haven't observed closely but charges very quickly.
Uses Quickcharge 3 so no complaints with charging speeds. About an hour and a half for a full charge.
Battery does not last day long if you are a even a  moderate user especially if you use two screens frequently. If you use one screen you will end up with 50% by the end of the day.
The Axon M has neat power saving settings and will alert you if an app has been draining the battery for a long time

Forget about heavy use with two screens, have charging available or a backup battery BUT I still LOVE the phone because this is a great phone to multitask and no more stupid multi window concept that was never a useful tool from my perspective.
Phone works good, it will handle some heavy use but expect your battery to drain
Huku

Very nice bar style phone that transforms into a phablet in no time. The power button is nicley placed in a recessed setting so there is no accidental power ups in the pocket. Power key acts like a finger print reader as well, which is awesome.
holy crap two screens
AXON M looks pretty bulky, but it's good enough for it. The only bad thing is flip opening procedure. It's really hard to open it.
Fyi
The full aluminum body feels amazing. The whole phone feels like a brick, extremely well build

This phone has screen on two sides so you can't put the phone down on a table and the screen is silky smooth and don't even want to put it on papers and stuff. I put it in a tent style, which works like a cell stand but I am afraid the edges can get scratched over a period of time. I wish ZTE thought this through and put little protruding edges at the corner so the screen does not touch when placed on the table, BUT I love this phone, multi tasking and big screen at your finger tips.

Thank you for all the love about our Axon M. If you contact us at 1-877-817-1759 we would love to resolve the issue you are having with the screen touching surfaces.

ZTEUSA Support
Takes some getting used to, especially flipping over the second screen could be a bit easier. But overall the phone has a good grip
Gjo
Screen is very bright and very minimal glare under the sunlight.
Color contrast is not great. It is okay though, not bad.

Color saturation is poor and not accurate when compared with samsung phones. The colors are pale especially with the stock icons. Youtube and other web content is okay and are not pale but not as vibrant as samsung phones.
Clarity is great, the DPI is about right for the screen size and does not show any degradation even when it is zoomed in.
Yee
Brightness is smooth and is very bright when full brightness and has a smooth increase and decrease variation.
Excellent, unlocked it for Tmobile and it is simply superb. 4G LTE all the way, signal reception is great and clear.
Simply superb, no issues
Managed to max out the speed of my 5Ghz network
Awesome, using it on tmobile and the reception is better than Tmobile phones with wifi calling. This one does not have wifi calling since it is not tmo but surpassed my testing for cell reception.
Very nice clear speakers, nice balanced mid, low and highs.
Loving mine in everyday use compared to my GS7 Active. Sounds are much more vivid and clear in all media formats.
